title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Hollywood, CA, USA
description:
Ticketmaster and 8th Light (http://www.8thlight.com/) are teaming up to host a day of intensive code practice as part of the Global Day of Coderetreat (http://globalday.coderetreat.org/). Join other LA-based programmers at LiveNation's Hollywood office for a day full of challenging and fun coding exercises. 
Bring your computer and brain! 
This event is limited to 30 people, reserve your spot at EventJoy (https://www.eventjoy.com/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-2014---los-angeles-california-529618) 
Agenda
===
8:30am - 9:00am -> Coffee, Meet, & Greet
9:00am - 1:00pm -> 4 - 45min coding sessions with 15min retrospectives
1:00pm - 2:00pm -> Lunch, provided by 8th Light
2:00pm - 5:00pm -> 3 - 45min coding sessions with 15min retrospectives
5:00pm - 5:30pm -> 30min closing circle
